Interface RequestController.Checker

Enclosing interface:
RequestController
@Public public static interface RequestController.Checker
Picks up the valid data.

    Method
    Description
    RequestController.ReturnCode
    canTakeRow(HRegionLocation loc, Row row)
    Checks the data whether it is valid to submit.

    reset()
    Reset the state of the scheduler when completing the iteration of rows.

  • Method Details

    • canTakeRow

      RequestController.ReturnCode canTakeRow(HRegionLocation loc, Row row)
      Checks the data whether it is valid to submit.
      Parameters:
      loc - the destination of data
      row - the data to check
      Returns:
      describe the decision for the row

    • reset

      void reset() throws InterruptedIOException
      Reset the state of the scheduler when completing the iteration of rows.
      Throws:
      InterruptedIOException - some controller may wait for some busy region or RS to complete the undealt request.
